So, I need to find someone willing to make that commitment because it is hard work.... It is important to me that I have people I can trust in terms of their expertise and their gut feeling. It is a difficult decision when you are putting a team around you. I also think it is important on show like this that you have people who are competitive with each other because essentially, the judges are taking part in this competition as well as the competitors. David Cameron said he was "very sorry" Andy Coulson was going but added that he could understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. Andy Coulson played a major role in helping propel Conservative leader David Cameron to power in elections in May 2010 and was a key backroom figure in Downing Street's slick media operation. Simon Cowell - who has an estimated personal fortune of over Â£ 165m- admits he was never academically successful but believes he has done well out of life because he has such good instincts. He said: All my life I had to teach myself. I never really had a proper education. I wasn't born with any skill. I didn't learn anything from school. "Mainly, I trust my instincts because I have very broad tastes. I genuinely believe that if I like something, other people are going to like it as well. according to a blog post penned by the man himself. The decision came down to how best optimise Google's triumvirate of power( Eric Schmidt , Page and Sergey Brin ) to become a more adaptable enterprise. Larry, Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making- and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured, Eric Schmidt said. While Page takes the helm of CEO, Eric Schmidt will be executive chairman where he said he will focus on "deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology
